specifications.title: Hinging
specifications.content: Specify hinging L (left) or R (right) when applicable.

specifications.title: Hinging
specifications.content: Single door units (all units less than 49") will be hinged on the blind side.

specifications.title: Hinging
specifications.content: Single door units (all units less than 42") will be hinged on the blind side.

specifications.title: Hinging
specifications.content: Single door units (all units less than 46" wide) will be hinged on the blind side

specifications.title: Doors
specifications.content: Doors are optional on this cabinet.

specifications.title: Doors
specifications.content: Units wider than 24" will have a pair of doors.

specifications.title: Doors
specifications.content: Units over 42" will have a pair of doors.

specifications.title: Doors
specifications.content: When opened, the folding doors are drawn inward by a cam system and revolve through the interior of the cabinet with the fittings.

specifications.title: Damping
specifications.content: An integral, adjustable pneumatic damping device ensures that the doors close quietly.

specifications.title: Doors
specifications.content: Three dimensional adjustment.

specifications.title: Doors
specifications.content: Units wider than 18" will have a pair of doors.

specifications.title: Doors
specifications.content: Units over 46" will have a pair of doors.

specifications.title: Doors
specifications.content: The door on these units are always hinged on the small side of the front of the unit.

specifications.title: Door height
specifications.content: By default, height reductions will decrease the door height of this cabinet.

specifications.title: Height
specifications.content: By default, height reductions will decrease the top door section height of this cabinet down to a minimum of 12", then the height of the bottom drawer section will decrease to a minimum of 6" until the desired height is achieved.

specifications.title: Height
specifications.content: By default, height reductions will decrease the top door section height of this cabinet down to a minimum of 12", then the height of the bottom door will decrease until the desired height is achieved.

specifications.title: Height
specifications.content: By default, height reductions will decrease the top section height of this cabinet down to a minimum of 12", then the height of the bottom section will decrease until the desired height is achieved.

specifications.title: Height
specifications.content: By default, height reductions will decrease the top door height of this cabinet to a minimum of 12 7/8". The height of the bottom section can be decreased to 29" high.

specifications.title: Height
specifications.content: By default, height reductions will decrease the top door height of this cabinet to a minimum of 38 7/8". The height of the bottom section can be decreased to 29" high.

specifications.title: Height
specifications.content: By default, height reductions will decrease the top door height of this cabinet to a minimum of 50 7/8". The height of the bottom section can be decreased to 29" high.

specifications.title: Height
specifications.content: By default, height reductions will decrease the door height of this cabinet down to a minimum of 11 7/8".

specifications.title: Appliance Frame
specifications.content: By default, height reductions will decrease the total appliance frame section down to a minimum of 12 7/8" until desired height is reached. The frame configuration will be changed according to your requirements and/or appliance specs.

specifications.title: Header
specifications.content: On cabinets with double doors, a stretcher matching the cabinet interior will be added below the false front. The front and bottom edge of the stretcher will be finished to match the cabinet exterior.

specifications.title: Header
specifications.content: The header is finished to match the cabinet exterior.

specifications.title: Stretcher
specifications.content: A stretcher matching the cabinet interior will be added below the false front. The front and bottom edge of the stretcher will be finished to match the cabinet exterior.

specifications.title: Installation
specifications.content: This unit is designed to be installed 3" off the wall on the blind side.

specifications.title: Shelves
specifications.content: No adjustable shelves or fixed shelves will be added by default for this height.

specifications.title: Shelves
specifications.content: One adjustable shelf will be added by default for this height.

specifications.title: Shelves
specifications.content: Two adjustable shelf will be added by default for this height.

specifications.title: Shelves
specifications.content: Three adjustable shelf will be added by default for this height.

specifications.title: Shelves
specifications.content: Four adjustable shelf will be added by default for this height.

specifications.title: Shelves
specifications.content: Five adjustable shelf will be added by default for this height.

specifications.title: Trays
specifications.content: Trays are height adjustable and have a non-slip grey or maple arena surface and chrome railing. 2 trays included.

specifications.title: Trays
specifications.content: Grey arena tray.

specifications.title: Trays
specifications.content: Maple arena tray.

specifications.title: Shelves
specifications.content: The top shelf changes from a 45° to a 90° corner on all widths less than 6".

specifications.title: Shelves
specifications.content: One adjustable shelf will be added by default for this height in lower section.

specifications.title: Shelves
specifications.content: Two adjustable shelfs will be added by default for this height in lower section.

specifications.title: Shelves
specifications.content: Three adjustable shelfs will be added by default for this height in lower section.

specifications.title: Shelves
specifications.content: One adjustable shelf will be added by default for this height in upper section.

specifications.title: Shelves
specifications.content: Two adjustable shelfs will be added by default for this height in upper section.

specifications.title: Shelves
specifications.content: Three adjustable shelfs will be added by default for this height in upper section.

specifications.title: Shelves
specifications.content: Four adjustable shelfs will be added by default for this height in upper section.

specifications.title: Shelves
specifications.content: One fixed shelf will be added by default for this height.

specifications.title: Shelves
specifications.content: Two fixed shelves will be added by default for this height.

specifications.title: Shelves
specifications.content: Two fixed shelves will be added by default for this height.

specifications.title: Drawer
specifications.content: Drawer height may be decreased to a minimum of 5 7/8" each.

specifications.title: Drawer
specifications.content: By default, height reductions will decrease the height of the bottom drawer down to a minimum of 5 7/8" until the desired height is reached.

specifications.title: Drawer
specifications.content: By default, height reductions will decrease the height of the first drawer over 5 7/8" down to a minimum of 5 7/8", then each successive drawer will be reduced in the same manner until the desired height is achieved.

specifications.title: Drawer
specifications.content: By default, height reductions will decrease the 3rd drawer (from top) height down to a minimum of 6 7/8" until the desired height is reached.

specifications.title: Drawer
specifications.content: By default, height reductions will decrease the bottom drawer height down to a minimum of 6 7/8" until the desired height is reached.

specifications.title: Drawer
specifications.content: By default, height reductions will decrease the height of the bottom drawer down to a minimum of 6 7/8" until the desired height is reached.

specifications.title: Drawers
specifications.content: 3 drawer options, White Intivo Drawers / Black Intivo Drawers / Stainless Steel Intivo Drawers.

specifications.title: Drawer
specifications.content: By default, height reductions will reduce the height of the middle drawer down to a minimum of 5 7/8" until the desired height is reached.

specifications.title: Drawer
specifications.content: By default, height reductions will decrease the height of the top drawer down to a minimum of 6 7/8" until the desired height is reached.

specifications.title: Sink
specifications.content: A 4 7/16" high header will be included on cabinet (as shown), which will serve to support a sink.

specifications.title: Sink
specifications.content: A 3" high header will be included on cabinet (as shown), which will serve to support a sink.

specifications.title: Sink
specifications.content: A 6" high header will be included on cabinet, which will serve to support a sink.

specifications.title: Cabinet
specifications.content: Cabinets over 39" wide will have a plywood top set shelf and heavy duty drawer slides and stabilizers. The bottom drawer box will be reduced by 1/8" in height and 1/2" in depth to accommodate the stabilizers.

specifications.title: Cabinet
specifications.content: When something other than the default height reduction is required, you must specify the desired drawer heights on a drawing and as a note attached to the cabinet in webquoin. The modify section height custom charge (CC-MODSECTIONH) will apply.

specifications.title: Cabinet
specifications.content: If the cabinet is open, a note must be added in webquoin to remove the mini gables.

specifications.title: Cabinet
specifications.content: If a custom width greater than 36" is ordered (CC-INCR-CORNER), both doors will be hinged and will open independently.

specifications.title: Cabinet
specifications.content: The left and right widths (W) will always match so the cabinet will always have a 45 degree angle.

specifications.title: Cabinet
specifications.content: For any height dimension or frame configuration changes, please specify your requirements on a drawing and as a note attached to the cabinet in webquoin. The frame configuration will be changed according to your requirements and/or the appliance specifications.

specifications.title: Open Cabinets
specifications.content: finish of the cabinet is controlled with the interior material dropdown-menu, best pratice for "Open Cabinets" is to create a separate room default for them.

specifications.title: Channel Cabinets
specifications.content: The height of the cabinet can NOT be decreased due to the fixed location of the channel.

specifications.title: Cabinets
specifications.content: This unit is designed to be installed 3” off the wall on the blind side.

specifications.title: Cabinets
specifications.content: For a base corner cabinet with left and right widths that do NOT match, please specify your requirements on a drawing and as a note attached to the cabinet in webquoin.

specifications.title: Cabinets
specifications.content: Specify L (the front is small on the left side) or R (the front is small on the right side).

specifications.title: Cabinets
specifications.content: The top of the unit is filled in and the bottom has spreaders across the width at the front and back of the unit. This setup allows access from the bottom of the unit for installation purposes.

specifications.title: Cabinets
specifications.content: The top set shelf is constructed of solid 5/8” plywood for strength and stability.

specifications.title: Cabinets bottom
specifications.content: The bottom of the cabinet is unfinished. If finishing the bottom is required, attach an Finish Cabinet Bottom (FCB).

specifications.title: Walloven frame
specifications.content: The walloven frame will have a detailed edge with the material type matching the door if the cutout sizes have been specified. The walloven frame will have a square edge with a veneer composite core panel if cutout sizes are not specified so the cutouts can be done on site.

specifications.title: Microwave frame
specifications.content: The microwave area will only be finished inside (same color as the exterior of the cabinets) if requested on the cabinet order and the appropriate charges are applied.

specifications.title: Microwave frame
specifications.content: The microwave frame will have a detailed edge with the material type match the door edgeprofile.

specifications.title: Cutout
specifications.content: The standard cutout is 15" H x 24" W

specifications.title: Blind wall
specifications.content: Single door units (all units less than 37") will be hinged on the blind side. This unit is designed to be installed 2" off the wall on the blind side.

specifications.title: Cabinet bottom
specifications.content: The bottom of an open cabinet will match the bottoms of the balance of cabinets in the room

specifications.title: Micro frame
specifications.content: Supply the microwave cutout sizes. The maximum cutout height is 17 5/8". The microwave frame will have a profile and the material type matching the door.

specifications.title: Extended doors
specifications.content: Doors for the wall cabinets extend 1/2" below the bottom set shelf to allow for a handle-free opening. Wall cabinet codes are based on the box height and do not include the additional 1/2" door overhang.

specifications.title: L channel
specifications.content: Actual height is 2 1/4" (not 2" as per the nomenclature). You may need to modify the door height of the cabinet onto which you stack this item so the door will overhang onto the L channel for handle-free opening.

specifications.title: C channel
specifications.content: Actual height is 2 7/8" (not 3" as per the nomenclature). You may need to modify the door height of the cabinet onto which you stack this item so the door will overhang onto the C channel for handle-free opening.

specifications.title: Wardrobe
specifications.content: Interior and exterior material and color MUST match.

specifications.title: Setshelf
specifications.content: The top set shelf  is constructed of solid 5/8” plywood for strength and stability.

specifications.title: Lazy Susan
specifications.content: Adding a Lazy Susan does not automatically remove the adjustable shelf(s).

specifications.title: Lazy Susan
specifications.content: When a full round lazy susan is ordered for this cabinet, the 24" depth increases to 28" and the 11" side width increases to 16 11/16".

specifications.title: TO1FM
specifications.content: The appliance(s) are meant for flush installation and have a door/face thickness that matches the cabinet doors (7/8" thick).

specifications.title: TO2FM
specifications.content: When one or multiple appliances have a door/face thickness that is greater than the cabinet doors. The cabinet is split into sections with varying depths to make the appliance face sit flush with the cabinet doors.

specifications.title: TO3FM
specifications.content: When the cabinet being ordered is wider than the appliance spec recommends. A frame or overlay filler with finished inside edges is placed on top of a backer panel to give the illusion of a flush installation.

specifications.title: Gables
specifications.content: Seams are visible on gables.

specifications.title: Finished ends
specifications.content: Seamless finished ends are possible.

specifications.title: Available Materials
specifications.content: all Wood Species, Engineered and Painted applications.

specifications.title: Finishing
specifications.content: Top face, bottom face, front edge and both side edges are finished.

specifications.title: Size
specifications.content: W x D

specifications.title: Brackets
specifications.content: Bracket hardware supplied will be 1 for every 16" of shelf. See chart.

specifications.title: Construction
specifications.content: Minimum shelf depth is 8" and maximum shelf depth is 15 3/4", 1 1/2" thick composite core with a taped edge.

specifications.title: Options
specifications.content: N/A

specifications.title: Restrictions
specifications.content: Maximum load restriction is 7 kg (15 lbs) per bracket, not including the shelf. Maximum 94" inch wide.

specifications.title: Finishing
specifications.content: Shelf has a solid wood edge on the front and both sides, Top and bottom faces are finished.

specifications.title: Construction
specifications.content: Minimum shelf depth is 8" and maximum shelf depth is 15 3/4". 2 1/4" thick composite core with a taped edge.

specifications.title: Available Materials
specifications.content: available in Wood Veneer and Painted doors.

specifications.title: Finishing
specifications.content: Finished both faces and 2 taped edges

specifications.title: Construction
specifications.content: nominal 1 9/16" thick panel constructed from a door integrated with a 3/4" back panel. Can be ordered as a wide horizontal panel (DEPH) or a tall vertical panel (DEPV). The dimensions for the stiles and rails will match the specifications of the selected door

specifications.title: Construction
specifications.content: nominal 1 9/16" thick panel constructed from a door integrated with a 3/4" back panel. Can be ordered as a wide horizontal panel (DEPH-EBR) or a tall vertical panel (DEPV-EBR)._Total height includes the extended bottom rail.

specifications.title: Construction
specifications.content: nominal 1 9/16" thick panel constructed from a door integrated with a 3/4" back panel. Can be ordered as a wide horizontal panel (DEPH-MK) or a tall vertical panel (DEPV-MK). Total height includes the mock kick.

specifications.title: Material
specifications.content: The ABP material is ordered as either 1/8" or 1/4" thick unfinished material

specifications.title: Finish
specifications.content: Material is unfinished MDF

specifications.title: Grain
specifications.content: (if applicable) will run vertically, or in the direction of the selected exterior material if there is a choice of VG or HG.

specifications.title: Material
specifications.content: The Panel material is 7/32" thick and is available in for all wood veneers and MDF for all painted applications.

specifications.title: Finish
specifications.content: Only the front face of the panel is finished.

specifications.title: Material
specifications.content: Matches interior of cabinet.

specifications.title: Drilling
specifications.content: Attached to door with DFS system.

specifications.title: Attached
specifications.content: For attaching hardware to door.

specifications.title: Available Materials
specifications.content: Available in Wood and Painted.

specifications.title: Finishing
specifications.content: A 3/4" panel with finished both faces and 3 taped edges (only for the regular version).

specifications.title: Construction
specifications.content: 3/4" thick MDF. Raw material is A1 (see Materials and Finishes section of the catalog for more information)

specifications.title: Finishing
specifications.content: A 1 1/2" panel with finished both faces and 3 taped edges (only for the regular version).

specifications.title: Construction
specifications.content: 1 1/2" thick MDF. Raw material is A1 (see Materials and Finishes section of the catalog for more information).

specifications.title: Construction
specifications.content: 1 1/2" thick Plywood. Raw material is A1 (see Materials and Finishes section of the catalog for more information).

specifications.title: Plywood
specifications.content: The panel is made using two sheets of 3/4" thick material laminated together to form the 1 1/2" nominal thickness (+/- 1/16") and is approximately 30% lighter than the composite core.

specifications.title: Construction
specifications.content: the panel is made out of composite core 3/4".

specifications.title: Edges
specifications.content: panel edges are not finished.

specifications.title: Height
specifications.content: we recommend that filler heights match adjacent cabinet heights.

specifications.title: Finish
specifications.content: front face will always be finished.

specifications.title: Construction
specifications.content: the panel is made out of composite core.

specifications.title: Width
specifications.content: Available in 1/8" increments from 2" - 6" wide.

specifications.title: Materials
specifications.content: Available in All materials.

specifications.title: Materials
specifications.content: Available in Wood, Mesa, Como, Plateau and Painted materials.

specifications.title: Construction
specifications.content: veneer for wood, MDF for painted applications. High Pressure laminate (HPL) for Mesa, Como and Plateau.

specifications.title: Specify
specifications.content: cabinet’s End Application, L (left), R (right) or L/R. Choose FE from the the Finish Side Header Drop-Down Menu in WQ.

specifications.title: Materials
specifications.content: Available in all Wood, M White Melamine, M Maple Melamine, Solid and Patterned Melamine, Engineered and Painted materials.

specifications.title: Finishing
specifications.content: Finished on face and gable edges.

specifications.title: Finishing
specifications.content: The bottom of a wall cabinet will match the selection made in the Interior Mtrl header Drop-Down Menu in WQ. However, if a cabinet is in a default room (DFZ for example), the bottom of the wall cabinet will match the main room.

specifications.title: Materials
specifications.content: Available in all Wood, Engineered and Painted.

specifications.title: Construction
specifications.content: The PBU is MDF core available in wood veneer and painted materials.
